mapper.select: SELECT e.`id`, e.`exam_name`, e.`section_id`, e.`specialty_id`, e.`examination_id`, e.`worktype_id`, e.`exam_time`, e.`start_time`, e.`end_time`, e.`up_time`, e.`start_timeC`, e.`end_timeC`,l.`specialty_name` as `specialty_name`, x.`examination_name` as `examination_name`, w.`worktype_name` as `worktype_name` FROM `smart_site`.`exam` e INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`specialty` l ON e.`specialty_id`=l.`id` INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`examination` x ON e.`examination_id`=x.`id` INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`worktype` w ON e.`worktype_id`=w.`id` WHERE e.`section_id`=#{section_id} ORDER BY e.`up_time` DESC limit 1;

SELECT e.`id`, e.`exam_name`, e.`section_id`, e.`specialty_id`, e.`examination_id`, e.`worktype_id`, e.`exam_time`, e.`start_time`, e.`end_time`, e.`up_time`, e.`start_timeC`, e.`end_timeC`,l.`specialty_name` as `specialty_name`, x.`examination_name` as `examination_name`, w.`worktype_name` as `worktype_name` FROM `smart_site`.`exam` e INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`specialty` l ON e.`specialty_id`=l.`id` INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`examination` x ON e.`examination_id`=x.`id` INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`worktype` w ON e.`worktype_id`=w.`id` WHERE e.`section_id`=#{section_id} and e.`worktype_id`=#{worktype_id} ORDER BY e.`up_time` DESC limit 1;
